Apr 12, 2020

Migrating Wordpress to GCP

 Summary of how to move your Wordpress workload to a GCP virtial machine. The article does not show you how to set up an instance in GCP but it does walk you through the process of installing a LAMP stack, how it sync your files, and how to install SSL certs using LetsEncrypt. Happy reading everyone!

What is Linux anyway? A quick overview of distributions.

 This is a broad overview of various Linux distributions available for running workloads for major Fortune 500 companies, embedded systems and devices, to our own personal media servers running in the cloud or under your basement steps. Enjoy!
